properties.comment: select fields of event only, referred value will be fetched from cache.
properties.entry: SELECT id, time_created, level, flag, message, reserved, logger_id, thread_id, caller_sk_id FROM `event` WHERE id=?
SELECT id, time_created, level, flag, message, reserved, logger_id, thread_id, caller_sk_id FROM `event` WHERE flag>4294967296 AND time_created>? LIMIT ?
